core

Class EquationSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.EquationSystem

  • public class EquationSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents an instance of the inductive theorem, which consists of a set equations over a signature Sigma, a subset of Sigma called C (constructors) and an equation that should be proven
